text: Denise Richards & Her Wild Things is an American reality television series that premiered on March 4, 2025, on Bravo. The series follows Denise Richards, her husband Aaron Phypers, and daughters Lola Sheen, Sami Sheen and Eloise Richards. == Cast == * Denise Richards * Aaron Phypers * Lola Sheen * Sami Sheen * Eloise Richards == Episodes == === Series overview === Season Episodes Originally released First released Last released 1 8 March 4, 2025 April 8, 2025 === Season 1 (2025) === No. overall No. season Title Original release date 1 1 “Wild Beginnings” March 4, 2025 2 2 “Spelling It All Out” March 4, 2025 3 3 “Drop Dead Gorgeous Lizard” March 11, 2025 4 4 “Only Pans” March 11, 2025 5 5 “Yes, Chef!” March 18, 2025 6 6 “Video Killed the Movie Star” March 25, 2025 7 7 “My Dinner with Charlie” April 1, 2025 8 8 “The Family that Photoshoots Together” April 8, 2025 Category:American reality television series Category:2020s American television series debuts
title: Denise Richards & Her Wild Things
